title: Sad And Smelly: Massive Fish Die-Off At Rio's 2016 Olympic Site
teaser: More than 50 tons of dead fish have been removed from a Rio de Janeiro lagoon slated to host Olympic events. Specialists blame algae blooms but water quality has been a concern for Olympic organizers.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
